import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const AboutSection = () => { return (

About Us

Pack for CampTM is a family-run online store that offers everything you need for summer camp under one roof.

We sell all the items you expect to find on a camp packing list: soft trunks, name labels, clip-on fans, bedding, laundry accessories, toiletries, storage solutions and more.

We also offer logowear to families from our partner camps.

One of the unique features of the website is the smart packing list option where you can purchase your entire camp packing list in one click, saving you lots of time.

Alternatively, you can browse the various collections and choose items at your leisure.

Our Story

We're Gaby Fachler and Melissa Goldwag, husband and wife team, and founders and owners of Pack for Camp.

A good part of our youth was spent around the campfire and we still love everything about summer camp!

Melissa enjoyed many summers as a camper, camp counselor and lifeguard while Gaby spent his summers as a camper, counselor and head counselor.

Our Heritage

We have a long family tradition of selling gear for kids going to summer camp. Melissa's parents, "Murray the Sockman" and Meryl have been running the store "Kosher Socks" for the past 40 years.

Located in South Fallsburg, NY, the store is still a hub of activity every summer.

Customer Reviews

"It was really so easy to find what I needed on the Pack for Camp website. The customer service is amazing, they answer emails right away and are very helpful."

- Chumi Rubin

Press here to contact us

); }; export default AboutSection;
